definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Mr. Know-all knows how to make a key.
sentences.chinese: 成事通先生知道如何配鑰匙。

sentences.english: Go to the Dormitory Management Office and ask for another one. You must pay for a new key.
sentences.chinese: 到宿舍管理室請求再配一支，但須自付配鑰匙的錢。
